name: ABC Happy Matching HD
description:
Looking for a way to train your kids’ memory? Don’t try to stuff their brain with words and numbers continuously. Let’s turning it into an interesting way by this matching game.

Although this kind of game can be found easily, player can learn 32 different English words and objects’ appearances with relaxing background music while doing matching. New objects will be drawn randomly on each level so as to stimulate player vision and ambition to complete the existing level.

Don’t doubt player on learning nothing with this happy matching because they will keep listening to the same pronunciations when match the objects wrongly. Cute and colourful images and design attract your kids to keep challenging the game and themselves. Repeat and repeat….Your kids will finally learn and recognise the English pronunciations of 32 words and appearances of the objects. If you listen fewer English pronunciations while they are playing this game, I have to say “Congratulations” to you because your kids’ memorising ability have been improved! And you can also test them by asking the names of the 32 objects at the next stage.


Features
-learn pronunciations of 32 English words and appearances of 32 objects
-train and improve memorising ability
-with relaxing background music
-with cute and colourful pictures and design
